revised_title: Monsieur Reaumur's Observations on Insects and Regeneration
tldr: The author provides an abstract of Monsieur Reaumur's observations on insects and their ability to regenerate after being cut into pieces. Reaumur discusses various experiments conducted by himself and other scientists, including those involving water insects, sea creatures, and earthworms. These experiments demonstrated the remarkable ability of some animals to regenerate lost body parts and reproduce new individuals from the remaining parts.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Invertebrate Biology
